title: Video: FKA Twigs x inc. – FKA x inc.
body:
Struggling to put into words just how beautiful this new video from **FKA Twigs** x **inc.**

is. Directed by Nick Walker and Twigs herself, it’s devastatingly composed, fitting the stunning track itself. Selling out in a matter of hours, _FKA x inc_. will see a release in April on 7″ vinyl, along with a colour, 8 page zine. Check it out below.

Directed by Nick Walker and Twigs herself, it’s devastatingly composed, fitting the stunning track itself. Selling out in a matter of hours, FKA x inc. will see a release in April on 7″ vinyl, along with a colour, \[…\]
